item.title: Obsidian Vault Restructure: Transforming Monolithic Documentation into a Wiki
item.description: Restructured 1,550-line monolithic homelab documentation into a professional Obsidian vault with 31 wiki-linked files across 8 organized folders, implementing git version control and automated backup strategies.
